about_the_game:
I have always dreamt of being a storyteller. As a young man I used to tell stories to my younger brothers and imagine the fantastical journey my words would take us all on.

So please join me, and let me tell you a story.

Welcome to Signals to EV is a narrative driven adventure game inspired by “Getting Over It with Bennet Foddy”. However instead of being a punishing game about starting over, Signals to EV is a more casual relaxing experience. This game was made because I wanted to tell stories. I hope that you’ll find something to enjoy about it and maybe even a lesson to take away. If you do, that's wonderful. Thank you for letting me share this experience with you. If you don't, that's okay too, thank you for trusting me with your time and attention.

Either way thank you , for soaking up the music, listening to the stories, and in the end choosing the path that's right for you.

Travel the world searching for human memories
Listen to the stories of humans gone by
Unravel the mysteries of Mothership and EV
Multiple endings and secrets to discover
Relaxing and calming adventure
Passive aggressive overseer

I have always dreamt of being a storyteller. As a young man I used to tell stories to my younger brothers and imagine the fantastical journey my words would take us all on.

So please join me, and let me tell you a story.

Welcome to Signals to EV is a narrative driven adventure game inspired by “Getting Over It with Bennet Foddy”. However instead of being a punishing game about starting over, Signals to EV is a more casual relaxing experience. This game was made because I wanted to tell stories. I hope that you’ll find something to enjoy about it and maybe even a lesson to take away. If you do, that's wonderful. Thank you for letting me share this experience with you. If you don't, that's okay too, thank you for trusting me with your time and attention.

Either way thank you , for soaking up the music, listening to the stories, and in the end choosing the path that's right for you.

name: Signals To EV

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • VR Support: NA
  • Additional Notes: NA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • VR Support: NA
  • Additional Notes: NA

short_description: Soak up the music, listen to the stories, and in the end choose the path that's right for you.
